summary: A flat terrain on an Island perfectly made for RTS or Tundra Defense.
descriptionHtml:
[size=7]Flat Island [/size]

[size=4][color=Red]Why did I make this? [/color] [/size]

I made this Island because I couldn't find a terrain that perfectly fit for my outpost or town, so I made a terrain myself, which didn't intervered with Tamriel (Skyrim).
Check those great mods out!

Tundra Defense: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22330/?
RTS: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12683/?

[size=4][color=Red]Where is this Island located? [/color] [/size]

You will find a ship at the docks of Solitude that will teleport you to the Island. (see pictures)

[size=4][color=Red]Video [/color] [/size]

[youtube]uzmDsCNsayk#t=0[/youtube]

Credits to: Youdojo for making a video about the map. :)

[size=4][color=Red]Changelog [/color] [/size]

[color=Green]v1.3: Fixed the spell, where players couldn't teleport, added a map marker, added fish and added hawks flying above the island, edited the ground level, so you can get out of the water more easily.
v1.2: Teleportation book and spell added, more 'life' added, critters, more plants and underwater ground.
v1.1: Navmesh added, AI compatibility![/color]

[size=4][color=Red]To install: [/color] [/size]

1. Copy 'Flat_Island'
2. Paste the plugin in your Skyrim Data file
C:Program Files (x86), Steam, SteamApps, common, skyrim, Data
3. You're done! Have fun.

[size=4][color=Red]To uninstall: [/color] [/size]

1. Remove the 'Flat_Island' plugin from your Skyrim Data file.
2. Done.

[size=4][color=Red]Suggestions? [/color] [/size]

Leave them in the comments section. :)

[size=4][color=Red]Bugs with the island? [/color] [/size]

Leave them in the comments section, so I can take a look at it. :)

[size=4][color=Red]Credits [/color] [/size]

Credits for the people who helped me out:

Krazyman999 for making the Navmesh!
Youdojo for making a video about the map!
author: LTBrian117
